text: I have a similar issue. The workflow is using the old List ID (hs_classic_list_id). As of now I am using the Search API to search for the List to get the classic ID, this workaround is fine. I would hope the Create API would provide the hs_classic_list_id or the workflow team could incorporate the new ILS ID.
Hey Team - Workflows is currently working on a new API that will utilize ILS IDs. I will keep you all updated on the progress, sorry about the inconvenience.
